HomePage.title: ONKONO
HomePage.description: Your personalized guide to proactive cancer screening. Answer a few questions to build a confidential, actionable plan.
HomePage.disclaimerContent1: This tool provides information for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The assessment is based on statistical data and cannot account for individual health conditions.
HomePage.disclaimerContent2: Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider regarding any medical concerns or before making any decisions related to your health. We do not store any personally identifiable information.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: This application ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our proactive health planner (the "Service").
PrivacyPage.anonymityIntro: The core principle of this Service is user anonymity. We have designed the system to avoid collecting or storing any Personally Identifiable Information (PII).
PrivacyPage.anonymityPoint1: No User Accounts: You do not need to create an account to use the Service.
PrivacyPage.anonymityPoint2: No Personal Data Storage: We do not ask for, collect, or store your name, email address, date of birth, or any other direct personal identifiers.
PrivacyPage.anonymityPoint3: Session-Based Data: The answers you provide to the questionnaire are stored only in your browser's local storage. This data is automatically deleted if you start a new assessment. It is never sent to our servers until you click "View Results".
PrivacyPage.processingIntro: To provide you with an assessment, we process the following information:
PrivacyPage.processingPoint1: Questionnaire Answers: The answers you provide are sent to our backend service and then to a third-party AI provider to generate your preventive health plan. This data is processed in-memory and is not stored or logged in association with any personal identifiers.
PrivacyPage.processingPoint2: IP Address: Your IP address is used temporarily for rate-limiting purposes to prevent abuse of the service. It is not stored or linked to your assessment data.
PrivacyPage.processingPoint3: Operational Logs: We may keep anonymized logs about assessment events (e.g., "SUCCESS," "AI_ERROR") for the purpose of monitoring our system's health and usage statistics. These logs contain no part of your questionnaire data.
PrivacyPage.emailIntro: We offer an optional feature to email your results to you. This process is designed to be "send-and-forget":
PrivacyPage.emailPoint1: You voluntarily provide an email address in a form.
PrivacyPage.emailPoint2: Your assessment results and the provided email address are sent to our server.
PrivacyPage.emailPoint3: Our server immediately relays this information to our email provider (Resend) to send the email.
PrivacyPage.emailPoint4: We do not store your email address on our servers after the email has been sent.
PrivacyPage.thirdPartyPoint1: AI Providers (Google Gemini, etc.): Your anonymized questionnaire answers are sent to our AI providers to generate the assessment. This data is subject to their respective privacy policies.
PrivacyPage.thirdPartyPoint2: Email Provider (Resend): If you use the email export feature, your email address and results are processed by Resend to deliver the email.
PrivacyPage.choicesContent: You are in control of your information. You can clear your assessment data at any time by closing your browser tab or starting a new assessment, which clears the previous session's data.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.intro: By using this proactive health planner (the "Service"), you agree to these Terms of Service.
TermsPage.notMedicalAdviceContent: The Service provides information for educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. This tool does not calculate risk scores; it generates recommendations based on established public health guidelines and your inputs. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider who can assess your individual needs.
TermsPage.noWarrantyContent: The Service is provided "as is" without any warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information presented. You rely on the information provided by this Service at your own risk.
TermsPage.liabilityContent: In no event shall we or our affiliates be liable for any damages, including but not to direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, arising out of or in connection with your use of or inability to use the Service.
TermsPage.useOfServiceContent: You agree to use the Service responsibly and not to misuse it. Misuse includes, but is not limited to, attempting to overload the system, interfering with its security, or using it for any unlawful purpose. We employ rate-limiting to ensure fair access for all users.
TermsPage.changesToTermsContent: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will post the most current version of these terms on this page. By continuing to use the Service after changes have been made, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

CookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
CookiesPage.intro1: Lexity ("us", "we", or "our") uses cookies on our website (the "Service"). By using the Service, you consent to the use of cookies.
CookiesPage.intro2: Our Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use cookies, how third-parties we may partner with may use cookies on the Service, your choices regarding cookies, and further information about cookies.
CookiesPage.whatAreCookiesContent: Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the Service or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the Service more useful to you.
CookiesPage.howWeUseCookiesIntro: When you use and access the Service, we may place a number of cookie files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes:
CookiesPage.essentialCookiesContent: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are essential for you to browse the website and use its features, such as accessing secure areas of the site.
CookiesPage.essentialCookiesPoint1: Supabase Auth: We use Supabase for user authentication. Supabase sets a secure, http-only cookie to manage your login session. This is critical for keeping your account secure and maintaining your signed-in state as you navigate the app.
CookiesPage.functionalCookiesContent: These are not traditional cookies, but use your browser's "Local Storage" feature. This allows us to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features. We use local storage for:
CookiesPage.functionalCookiesPoint1: Theme Preference: To remember your light or dark mode preference across visits.
CookiesPage.functionalCookiesPoint2: Language Preference: To remember your currently selected target language for a seamless learning experience.
CookiesPage.functionalCookiesPoint3: Cookie Consent: To remember whether you have accepted our cookie policy so we don't have to ask you again on every visit.
CookiesPage.yourChoicesContent1: If you'd like to delete cookies or instruct your web browser to delete or refuse cookies, please visit the help pages of your web browser.
CookiesPage.yourChoicesContent2: Please note, however, that if you delete cookies or refuse to accept them, you might not be able to use all of the features we offer, you may not be able to store your preferences, and some of our pages might not display properly. Our essential authentication cookie is required to log in to the service.
CookiesPage.moreInfoTitle: Where can you find more information about cookies?
CookiesPage.moreInfoContent: You can learn more about cookies and the following third-party websites:

AssessmentPage.resumeDialogDescription: It looks like you have a session in progress. Would you like to resume or start a new assessment?
AssessmentPage.heightMetricRange: Please enter a height between 50 and 300 cm.
AssessmentPage.heightImperialRange: Please enter a height between 20 and 120 inches.
AssessmentPage.weightMetricRange: Please enter a weight between 20 and 300 kg.
AssessmentPage.weightImperialRange: Please enter a weight between 40 and 660 lbs.

ResultsPage.noDataDescription: It looks like you haven't generated a plan yet.
ResultsPage.loadingMessage1: Connecting to our secure analysis engine...
ResultsPage.loadingMessage2: Analyzing your lifestyle factors against our risk models...
ResultsPage.loadingMessage3: Synthesizing results and generating personalized recommendations...
ResultsPage.errorDescription: We couldn't process your results at this time.
ResultsPage.resultsDescription: This is a personalized plan based on public health guidelines. Please discuss it with your healthcare provider.
ResultsPage.doctorStarter1: "Based on my lifestyle, what are the most important screenings for me at this age?"
ResultsPage.doctorStarter2: "I'd like to discuss my diet and activity levels. What's one change you'd recommend I focus on first?"
ResultsPage.doctorStarter3: "Given my smoking history and potential exposures, what should I be aware of regarding my lung health?"
ResultsPage.doctorStarter4: "Are there any specific symptoms I should be aware of, given my risk factors?"
ResultsPage.exportDescription: Save this plan to discuss with a healthcare professional. We do not store this data.
ResultsPage.emailDialogDescription: Enter your email address to receive a copy of your plan. We will not store or use your email for any other purpose.
